content: a cute little filet crochet cat to use as a decorative doily or coaster pattern is for crochet thread but it could be made in other yarn with appropriate hook this is a charted filet crochet pattern with a few written instructions appropriate for a advanced beginner and a nice first project if you re just learning filet crochet designed for national crochet month and part of the 2017 natcromo blog tour on crochetville
